title: Getting off of alpha client
body: Is there any way at all i can get off the alpha client, it's super slow and I'd much rather have the older one, it looks much better and a whole lot faster too. If anyone could help that'd be great. Thanks!

replies.body:
Uninstalling the updated client would also remove the legacy since they use the same files.  Instead, you can just go back to the legacy client without having to do all that:

-  On the login screen of the open beta updated client, look for the "Launch Legacy Client" text at the bottom.
-  Or create a shortcut directly to the legacy client in your League Installation. Just look for "lol.launcher"

Let me know if you have any questions!
I want to do that aswell but will i still get the icon for the "alpha tester"?
The icons were intended for those who participated in the alpha testing, and ended on November 15.  Eligible players should be getting their icons by the 29th!
